languages.text: "Данное утверждение ложно. Вопреки //убеждению//желанию верить// многих слуг Омнисии, официальное коммюнике высшего конклава флота по данному решению не было //сформулировано//утверждено//".

traits.locale_text: "Данное утверждение ложно. Вопреки //убеждению//желанию верить// многих слуг Омнисии, официальное коммюнике высшего конклава флота по данному решению не было //сформулировано//утверждено//".
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "This statement is false. Contrary to what many servants of the Omnissiah //thought they knew//preferred to believe//, the Fleet's Supreme Conclave never //formulated//issued// an official statement on that decision."
languages.original_text: "Данное утверждение ложно. Вопреки //убеждению//желанию верить// многих слуг Омнисии, официальное коммюнике высшего конклава флота по данному решению не было //сформулировано//утверждено//".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. Contrary to what many servants of the Omnissiah //thought they knew//preferred to believe//, the Fleet's Supreme Conclave never formulated/issued an official statement on that decision."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. Contrary to what many servants of the Omnissiah //thought they knew//preferred to believe//, the Fleet's Supreme Conclave never //formulated//issued// an official statement on that decision."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: 「この声明は誤りである。万機神の従者の多くが//彼らが知っていると思っていた//信じたいと思っていた//こととは対照的に、艦隊の最高評議会はその決断に関する公式声明を決して//考案//発行//しなかった」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Contrary to what many servants of the Omnissiah //thought they knew//preferred to believe//, the Fleet's Supreme Conclave never //formulated//issued// an official statement on that decision."

traits.locale_text: 「この声明は誤りである。万機神の従者の多くが//彼らが知っていると思っていた//信じたいと思っていた//こととは対照的に、艦隊の最高評議会はその決断に関する公式声明を決して//考案//発行//しなかった」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。尽管欧姆尼塞亚许多仆人//以为他们知道真相//假装知道真相//，但舰队的最高密会从来没有对阿玛纳特的教义//制定过任何规定//发表任何正式声明//。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Contrary to what many servants of the Omnissiah //thought they knew//preferred to believe//, the Fleet's Supreme Conclave never //formulated//issued// an official statement on that decision."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。尽管欧姆尼塞亚许多仆人//以为他们知道真相//假装知道真相//，但舰队的最高密会从来没有对阿玛纳特的教义//制定过任何规定//发表任何正式声明//。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Anders als viele Diener des Omnissiah //zu wissen glaubten//zu glauben bevorzugten//, hat das oberste Konklave der Flotte über diese Entscheidung niemals eine offizielle Erklärung //formuliert//veröffentlicht//."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Contrary to what many servants of the Omnissiah //thought they knew//preferred to believe//, the Fleet's Supreme Conclave never //formulated//issued// an official statement on that decision."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Entgegen, was viele Diener des Omnissiah //zu wissen glaubten//zu glauben bevorzugten//, hat das oberste Konklave der Flotte über diese Entscheidung niemals eine offizielle Erklärung formuliert/veröffentlicht."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Contrairement à ce que //croyaient savoir//préféraient croire// bon nombre de serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, le Conclave Suprême de la Flotte n'a jamais formulé//émis// de déclaration officielle à ce sujet. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Contrary to what many servants of the Omnissiah //thought they knew//preferred to believe//, the Fleet's Supreme Conclave never //formulated//issued// an official statement on that decision."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Contrairement à ce que //croyaient savoir//préféraient croire// bon nombre de serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, le Conclave Suprême de la Flotte n'a jamais formulé/émis de déclaration officielle à ce sujet. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «Esta declaración es falsa. Al contrario de lo que muchos siervos del Omnissiah //creían saber//preferían creer//, el Cónclave Supremo de la Flota jamás //formuló/pronunció// ninguna declaración oficial sobre aquella decisión».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Contrary to what many servants of the Omnissiah //thought they knew//preferred to believe//, the Fleet's Supreme Conclave never //formulated//issued// an official statement on that decision."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es falsa. Al contrario de lo que muchos siervos del Omnissiah //creían saber//preferían creer//, el Cónclave Supremo de la Flota jamás formuló/pronunció ninguna declaración oficial sobre aquella decisión».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Hermesih'in birçok hizmetkârının //bildiğini düşündüğü//inanmayı tercih ettiği// şeyin aksine Filo Yüce Meclisi, hiçbir zaman böyle bir karara dair bir bildiri //ortaya koymadı//yayınlamadı//."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Contrary to what many servants of the Omnissiah //thought they knew//preferred to believe//, the Fleet's Supreme Conclave never //formulated//issued// an official statement on that decision."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Hermesih'in birçok hizmetkârının //bildiğini düşündüğü//inanmayı tercih ettiği// şeyin aksine, Filo'nun Yüce Meclis'i hiçbir zaman böyle bir karara dair bir bildiri //düzenlemedi//yayınlamadı//."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
